item.title: How do i make
item.dc:creator: @Ruzuronni Ruzuronni
item.description:
@Ruzuronni wrote:

Were is level ups
[br][size=1]Posted on: September 17, 2007, 02:09:40 PM[/size][hr]HELP!!![br][size=1]Posted on: September 17, 2007, 02:21:43 PM[/size][hr]were do i add in thiss

case 3: //Hitpoint
//sendFrame164(6216);
//sendFrame126(“Congratulations, you just advanced a hitpoints level!”, 6217);
//sendFrame126(“Your hitpoints level is now “+playerLevel[3]+” .”, 6218);
sendMessage(“Congratulations, you just advanced a hitpoints level.”);
//NpcDialogueSend = true;
break;

item.title: How do i make
item.dc:creator: @Steph2 Steph.
item.description:
@Steph2 wrote:

find case 3: //hitpoints Something similar…

then add
addItem(ITEM#, 1); sendMessage("Congratz On Maxing Out Your "+playerLevel[#]+", Have A Skill Cape!");
Remember to thange the playerLevel[…] To the appropriate one…

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

add this under the level ups.

if (playerLevel[skill] >= 135) { sendMessage("Congratulations on getting Level 135 Attack!"); addItem(####, 1); addItem(####, 1); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " Congratz on "+playerLevel[0]+" Attack!"); }
